Isabella Rodriguez.description: working at the counter and serving customers (taking inventory of supplies) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cooking area

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about vegan food adventures and trying out vegan specials at Hobbs Cafe, planning a vegan sushi date on Friday, enjoying each other's company @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! How's your morning going so far?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! It's going well, thanks for asking. I'm just on my way to the library to work on my research. What about you?
Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! I was actually just about to head to Hobbs Cafe to grab some lunch. Do you want to join me?
Klaus Mueller
I would love to join you for lunch, Maria. I can take a break from my research and meet you at Hobbs Cafe.
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll see you there in 10 minutes then. Looking forward to chatting more over lunch.
Klaus Mueller
Sounds good, Maria. I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe in 10 minutes.
Maria Lopez
See you soon, Klaus! Let's catch up on our vegan food adventures.
Klaus Mueller
I'm excited to try out the vegan lasagna and vegan chocolate cake at Hobbs Cafe with you!
Maria Lopez
I'll also ask the chef if they have any new vegan specials today. It'll be a fun surprise!
Klaus Mueller
I'm looking forward to trying out the vegan specials with you, Maria! It's always great exploring new vegan options.
Maria Lopez
I'm glad we share a passion for vegan food! It's always fun trying out new dishes together.
Klaus Mueller
I'll grab my research notes and meet you at Hobbs Cafe in 10 minutes. Looking forward to trying out the vegan specials with you!
Maria Lopez
See you at Hobbs Cafe in 10 minutes, Klaus! Let's continue our vegan adventures over lunch!
Klaus Mueller
I can't wait to hear about your favorite vegan dishes at Hobbs Cafe!
Maria Lopez
I'm also excited for our vegan sushi date on Friday! It's going to be so much fun exploring more delicious vegan options together.
Klaus Mueller
I'm also looking forward to our vegan sushi date on Friday! It's going to be a great way to end the week.
